title: Complex Skill Formative Assessment Design Using Video-Enhanced Rubrics

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Job-Related Technical Skills and Proficiency in Digital Learning Tools
context.additional_context: Project-Based Assessment for Practitioners in Mobile Device-Based Microlearning Environments

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the performance procedures of composite skills with over 80% accuracy through a video-enhanced rubric.
Learners can improve the accuracy of self-assessment by 30% by referencing peer practitioner video cases.
Learners can master audience response management skills with over 70% proficiency when applying non-verbal scripts.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
